item.title: Now Generally Available: Platform SSO for macOS with Microsoft Entra ID
item.description: We’re pleased to announce the General Availability (GA) of Microsoft’s support for Platform Single Sign-On (Platform SSO) for macOS, providing enterprise environments with an integrated, secure, and improved single sign-on experience on Apple devices. What is Platform SSO? Platform SSO is an advanced feature integrated into macOS and supported by Microsoft Enterprise SSO plug-in.
